activities: Server Intellect collects the following personal data such as internet protocol address, the kind of browser or computer you use, State or Country from which you accessed the Server intellect website, date and time of the website visit, prospective customer information, services sign up information and customer contact information which may include the following; name, address, organization (if applicable), email address, payment information (credit card, e-check, cvv, check information), telephone, fax, mobile number. This personal data is collected through a variety of sources; Server Intellects website, telephone calls, live chat, web forms, internal ticketing system and written correspondences. This information is used to provide services to our customers.
eucountries: Belgium, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
